name: tentacool
comment: Tentacool (Menokurage) is an aquatic Pokémon based on the box jellyfish.

name: blastoise
comment: Charizard, Blastoise, Pikachu, and many other Pokémon have been discovered on planet Earth!

name: beedrill
comment: The two of them run into a wooded area—and right into an angry Beedrill.
